page.title: 11MY FAMILY
page.content: My Dad gets up about 6.45 and has to feed our 10,000 chickens.After my Mum has taken us to School, she starts to collect eggs with two lady helpers. By now Dad has collected the ducks' eggs and then he loads the vans with David, his full-time worker.When they are full, David drives his van to Ipswich market to sell the eggs. Dad goes on his wholesale round for the rest of the day. In the morning he goes to the Harwich area & after lunch around Clacton. My Mum has been grading the eggs. She uses a machine which puts them into their right sizes. Then she does the bookwork for the business. By now its time to pick us up from School & she gets the tea ready. When Dad comes home, he cuts the grass while Mum cleans the house & does the washing. We watch TV or read until its time for bed.
